modName: Expanded Fish Steaks - RND and iNeed compatible
summary: Adds steak recipes for the rest of the vanilla fish.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Trebuchet MS][font=Tahoma]Tired of catching fish after fish after fish just to go to the cooking pot and have no way to cook them?

This is the mod for you.

Now you can make:
[/font][list]
[*][font=Tahoma]Abecean Longfin steak.[/font]
[*][font=Tahoma]Cyrodilic Spadetail steak.[/font]
[*][font=Tahoma]River Betty steak.[/font]
[*][font=Tahoma]Silverside Perch steak.[/font]
[*][font=Tahoma]Histcarp steak.[/font]
[*][font=Tahoma]Your character happy and satiated.[/font]
[/list][font=Tahoma]
All recipes require one of the respective fish and one salt pile just like the salmon steak.
Catch all the fish! Eat all the fish! Let your character get so fat on alternate fish steaks that she/he can't even adventure anymore!
Hurrah!

[size=4][u]Installation
[/u][size=2]There are two (count 'em two) esps available. One esp is for vanilla/iNeed (iNeed will take care of it on its own). The other is for Realistic Needs & Diseases (both original and 2.0) and is classified as a light snack.
Choose wisely.[/size][/size][/font][/font]
author: nbwalsh
